c74object.name: ambipan~
c74object.description: The ambipan~ object spatializes a mono sound in a plan thanks to the ambisonic B format of Michael Gerzon. The gains of every loudspeaker help create a virtual location of the sound source around the listener.

metadatalist.metadata: R.MIGNOT, B.COURRIBET, CICM, Paris-8 University, MSH Paris Nord, ACI Jeunes, Max 6.0.4 version by E.PARIS

inlet.digest: Audio signal input or source coordinates and others messages.
Abscissa or distance of the source, according to the coordinate type.
ordinate or angle of the source in degrees, according to the coordinate type.

objarg.name: number-of-outputs
objarg.digest: The Number of outlets, and so of loudspeakers by default.
objarg.description: The argument specify the number of output channels you need, and so of loudspeakers by default, it must be between 2 and 32. Without parameters there are 4 outlets.

objarg.name: coordinate-type
objarg.description: Coordinate type : 'c' = cartesian, 'p' = polar, by default the coordinates are cartesian.

objarg.name: ambisonic-offset
objarg.description: Set the Ambisonic offset. By default 0.3.

objarg.name: interpolation-time
objarg.digest: Set the Interpolation time in ms. (Works with control data only).
objarg.description: Set the Interpolation time in ms. (Works with control data only). By default 10.

method.name: set_nb_hp
method.description: The word set_nb_hp, followed by an int, change the loudspeakers number. the number must be between 2 and the number of current outputs.

method.name: get_info
method.digest: Print informations into the Max window.

method.name: mute_sig
method.description: In order to deactivate the audio inlets. When they are desactivated, the list coordinates is received by the first inlet.

method.name: change_type
method.description: In order to change the coordinates type: 'c'= cartesian, 'p' = polar.

method.name: xy_setpos
method.description: The symbol "xy_setpos" helps modify the loudspeakers arrangement with their cartesian coordinates. (abscissa-ordinate) from the first loudspeaker to the last.

method.name: ra_setpos
method.description: With the symbol "ra_setpos" we can modify the arrangement with polar coordinate, (distance-angle).

method.name: a_setpos
method.description: With the symbol "a_setpos" we can modify the arrangement only with the distance. So the loudspeakers are on the unity circle with the specified angle.
